data.name: Rogue Trooper Redux - Collector's Edition Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
The Collector’s Upgrade Edition includes:
• The original 21 track Rogue trooper soundtrack!
• An exclusive Rogue trooper comic, inspired by the game
• 2 sets of HD desktop wallpapers

Track Listing

1) Rogue Trooper Main Theme
2) The Orange Coast
3) Nort Naval Base
4) A Suitable Welcome
5) Together Again
6) Escape Route
7) A Very Special Guest
8) The Streets Of Nu Paree
9) Live To Fight Another Day
10) Hoppa Chase
11) Hoppa On Point
12) Crashed Satellite
13) Nu Atlanta Assault
14) Too Late
15) Hovertrain Journey
16) The Petrified Forest
17) Snipers
18) Southers' Last Stand
19) Morgen Face-Off
20) The Quartz Zone Massacre
21) The Renegade

data.short_description: Rogue Trooper Redux - Collector's Edition Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8.1 or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8.1 or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7-3770 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 970 / AMD GPU Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
